name: Fork and Spoon
description: The same scoop that we use in our shops! These professional grade Zeroll scoops have a sleek, engraved handle.

name: Colorful Stapula
description: The spatula has a comfortable wood handle with a hanging loop and a convenient measurement guide on the reverse side of the artwork to help get the batter ready for baking.

name: Bamboo Matcha Green Tea Whisk
description: If you want to make nutritious, antioxidant-rich matcha tea or the delicious matcha lattes trending at your favorite caf√©, you'll need this authentic whisk called a chasen. Crafted of natural bamboo with sturdy bristles, it's suitable for daily use or special Japanese tea ceremonies.

name: Glass Infuser Teapot
description: Our exclusive glass teapot includes a loose-leaf infuser. Ideal for entertaining, this exclusive teapot features a curved spout and large handle for precise pouring.

name: Cute Critter Tea Cozies Set Of 3
description: Keep your tea warm in your glass or ceramic teapot with our knit tea cozies in hedgehog, lamb and owl designs. Traditionally used in Ireland, they add a whimsical touch to your teatime entertaining.
